articles.description: Uncertainty about Bo Nix’s health has swirled all week. Some comments from WR Kris Hutson on Wednesday caused ripple effects in Las Vegas.
articles.content:
A lot has taken place in Eugene over the past 24 hours, and one person’s comments have created a huge ripple effect that may cost Las Vegas oddsmakers quite a bit of money.
For four days, Oregon and… [+3592 chars]
